description: Brand new luxury building in Fort Greene / Downtown Brooklyn. The apartment has gorgeous dark maple strip floors, a sleek kitchen with Caesar stone counter top breakfast bar, a fabulous 4 piece stainless steel appliance package framed with beautiful blue glass tiled back splash and pendant lighting, huge windows, great closets, crisp white tile bathrooms with Toto, Grohe and Kohler fixtures, and your own stacked Bosch washer and dryer.
name: Luxury high rise in Downtown Brooklyn
